articles.title: Dillian Whyte calls for WBC to order Deontay Wilder to face him in world title fight instead of Tyson Fury - Sky Sports
articles.description: Dillian Whyte has urged the WBC to order a world title fight against Deontay Wilder as a resolution, with Tyson Fury's fight against the American set to be postponed.
